name: prevent-double-tap-zoom
description: No zooming on mobile when user double taps on a button/screen.

scripts.publish:patch: yarn build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: yarn build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: yarn build && npm version major && npm publish

author: Koen van Gilst <koen.vangilst@gmail.com> (https://koenvangilst.nl)
